projects.title: What-If - Explainable AI Image Counterfactual Generator
projects.description: Developed a ViT-based classifier with explainable AI to generate and visualize counterfactual explanations for image predictions.

projects.title: CRISP - Comprehensive Route Information System for Passengers
projects.description: A modular, dynamic bus tracking solution using Arduino, Spring Boot with Java, and a user-friendly mobile interface created with Flutter.

projects.title: Wav2Lip
projects.description: The Wav2Lip repository is an implementation of the Wav2Lip algorithm, a deep learning model for lip-syncing videos.It ensures high-quality, realistic lip synchronization by aligning spoken audio with the lip movements of the target video.
